Text: looking/hearing forward to listen to this thankssssss

Thanks for sharing this collection.
Glenn Gould is simply put the best of the bunch when it comes to play compositions by The Old Master.
Thank You very much for this great collection!
Thanks for this, we really appreciate it. I'll up some of my own classical recordings, amongst others some of the Great Pianists of the Century collection by Phillips.
Fantastic but what about SEEDING...and thanks by the way :P
Thank you Laszlo. Greetings from Austria/Vienna

This is a great collection - but I am looking for something in addition to.  Does anyone have the music Gould played for Soundtrack of the film Slaughterhouse-Five?  All Bach, Gould tweaked and re-tweaked (as he loved to do) the arrangements to something at once beautiful and terrible.  Unfortunately It has not been re-issued on CD and my only audio copy has been 'borrowed.'

Cheers all.
The quality is CRAP. How could you do that to quality music?
